product_name: Speck Stylefolio Tablet Case - iPad Air
long_description: Speck Stylefolio Tablet Case for iPad(R) Air offers all-around protection with a formfitting outer shell and soft anti-scratch inner lining for protection from accidental bumps, drops, and spills. Adjustable stand offers 4 viewing angles. The Speck Stylefolio Tablet Case features a locking clasp that secures your iPad Air in folded mode or shut off when you're on the go.
short_description: Speck Stylefolio Tablet Case for iPad(R) Air offers all-around protection with a formfitting outer shell and soft anti-scratch inner lining for protection from accidental bumps, drops, and spills.
